successes.title: CyPhy LVL 1 Drone: Reinvented for Performance and Control
successes.description: From iRobot cofounder Helen Greiner, the first drone for everyone. It's safe, shoots films, and snaps beautiful pictures.

Pledges.description: DRONE PRIDE BUMPER STICKER.  Display your drone pride with an "I Fly Cyphy" bumpersticker.  Receive special updates from the CyPhy team.
TEE SHIRT.  Show your support with a cool limited-edition Drone T-shirt.  Receive special updates from the CyPhy team.  We will email you to get your T-shirt size.

EARLIEST BIRD CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE.  Reward includes 1Xdrone, 1Xcharger and cable, and 1Xbattery.   
Download mobile app separately.

EARLY BIRD CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE.  Reward includes 1Xdrone, 1Xcharger and cable, and 1Xbattery.   
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE.  Reward includes 1Xdrone, 1Xcharger and cable, and 1Xbattery.   
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE PRO PACK. Reward includes 1Xdrone, 1Xspare prop set, and 2Xbattery. This pack will have a retail value over $750.
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE PRO PACK. Reward includes 1Xdrone, 1Xcharger and cable, 1Xspare prop set, and 2Xbattery. Newly added, this pack will have a retail value over $750!
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 DRONE PILOT'S PACK.  Reward includes 1Xdrone, 2Xcharger and cable, 1Xspare prop set, and 2Xbattery.   
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 DOUBLE DRONE PACK. Here by popular request, two early-birds in one! Reward includes 2x drone, 2x charger and cable, and 2x battery. Download mobile app separately. This pack will have a retail value over $1200.

CYPHY LVL 1 DIABLO.  Black and Red colors distinguish the diablo visually, but its carbon fiber blades, high performance batteries, and hard carrying case make it a devilish drone.   Reward includes 1X diablo drone, carrying case, 2Xcharger and cable, and 2X battery.   
Download mobile app separately.

CYPHY LVL 1 SWARM.  Reward includes 10Xdrone, 10Xcharger and cable, and 10Xbattery.  We know you're buying these to hack, so we are throwing in 10 hours of hacking support.
Download mobile app separately.
